doc.title: Okulaba okunene ku Link Open With extension
doc.description:
Okugaziya kuno kukusobozesa okufuga mu ngeri ennyangu engeri hyperlinks gye ziggulwamu.

Eddirisa: bulawuzi endala, amadirisa agafuluma, amadirisa amapya, amadirisa amapya agatali ga bulijjo, eddirisa eririko kati (erya bulijjo)

Tabu: kkono wa tabu eriwo kati, tabu eriwo kati, ddyo wa tabu eriwo kati (esookerwako)

Embeera y'okukola: tekola, kola amangu ddala (esookerwako)
